condition: I forgot the steps of problem solving
condition_name: I forgot the steps of problem solvin
message_text: Sorry to hear that you are finding this challenging. When we have a problem, we always want to get to the quickest end result and can forget about the steps. Really understanding the problem and the different solutions first helps to come up with the best solution together. You can do this!

condition: We could not agree on one solution to try out and got into an argument
condition_name: We could not agree on one solution t
message_text: Sorry to hear that you are finding this challenging. Sometimes it can be difficult to agree with everyone in the family, especially if not everyone is calm yet. You could agree to try one first, then the other. Or If you get stuck, try to get together later  to agree on the solution together. You can do this!

condition: My child or teen got angry and did not want to talk about the problem
condition_name: My child or teen got angry and did n
message_text: @fields.child_nickname

Sorry to hear that you are finding this challenging. Try to notice @fields.child_nickname's emotions. If they need some time to calm down, create a calm space later on in the day or week to discuss and solve the problem together. By taking your time, the problem can be solved well. You can do this!

message_text: @fields.child_nickname

That's okay! The important thing is that @fields.child_nickname knows that you are here for them. Try to keep an open channel of communication with them by spending quality time together and accepting their ideas. Problem solving with your children is a great way to reduce conflict in the family!
